item.description:
Fall is in the air and mushrooms are about to pop up to greet us. We went here in the Spring and there are many ponds and low land areas that should make for a successful hunt. Bring your mushroom book, bags, knife, walking shoes and water. Print out a trail map. The walks take about 2-3 hours. Register so we know who to wait for. My cell is 781-608-1370 if you need to call.

We will meet at the parking lot on Salem St. near the Main Office and southwest side of Stearns Pond.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Mushroom Lovers USA sign
item.name: Harold Parker here we come!
